name: EnergyRhythm
signal_source: Productivity discussions: 'Why do apps schedule tasks by time when my energy varies completely day to day?'
description: Energy-based task scheduling that optimizes productivity by matching task complexity to natural energy fluctuations
target_user: Knowledge workers seeking to optimize productivity through awareness of natural energy and focus patterns
pain_point_evidence: Users reporting poor task completion when fighting against natural energy rhythms instead of working with them
differentiation: First productivity app that prioritizes energy optimization over time management
subscription_fit: Premium analytics, advanced pattern recognition, and health data integration

pricing.trial_strategy: 14-day trial with basic energy tracking, premium unlocks advanced pattern analysis
